amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for drug courts by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for International Trade Administration Operations by $5 million and increase funding for drug courts by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Guinta amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Guinta amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Guinta.
